about_the_game:
Quiz Racer is a fast-paced zero-gravity racing trivia game with procedurally generated environments that will get you addicted to learning!

AVOID OBSTACLES

You will speed through a variety of different obstacles on a procedurally generated and neverending track. No two runs will ever be the same!

ANSWER QUESTIONS

Questions will pop up along the way and you will have to quickly crash your spaceship into the correct responses!

HAVE FUN LEARNING

The fast-paced gameplay loop is designed to be fun and addictive while helping you remember the questions you encounter.

COMPETE WITH YOUR FRIENDS

Upload your high scores and compare them with your friends. Find out who the fastest trivia pilot in the galaxy is!

IN THE FUTURE

Planned features include:

  • Many different categories of questions: from geography and language learning to math and medicine

  • Customizable parts for your ship that affect its stats

  • Progression system to unlock new parts, obstacle types and question packs as you play

  • Stats to track your learning

  • Localization for 8+ languages, including Spanish, German, Italian, French, Chinese and Russian
